title: War In The Pacific National Historical Park: Mt. Chachao/ Mt. Tenjo Unit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Mt. Chachao/ Mt. Tenjo Unit              Mt. Chachao/ Mt. Tenjo Unit       The Mt. Chachao/Mt. Tenjo Unit provided the Japanese defenders with a view of United States troops landing at Asan Beach and a scenic overview of Apra Harbor and Orote Point. The unimproved trail leads to foxholes, trenches, and a World War I American gun emplacement.
